item.name: Master Edge
item.desc: An upgraded but inaccurate brave weapon with a lot of power behind it.

item.name: Gustblade
item.desc: Uses MAG to determine damage. Grants wielder SPD +2.

item.name: Flareblade
item.desc: Uses MAG to determine damage. Grants wielder RES +2.

item.name: Boltblade
item.desc: Uses MAG to determine damage. Grants wielder DEF +2.

item.name: Aetherblade
item.desc: Uses MAG to determine damage. Grants wielder SPD/DEF/RES +2.

item.name: Rapier
item.desc: Ignores DEF. Targets enemy's SPD instead.

item.name: Magebane Swd
item.desc: Grants wielder RES +10. Silences on hit.

item.name: Flash
item.desc: The exceptionally powerful and well-weighted Arundelian royal blade. It hits twice, but is very fragile.

item.name: Master Lance
item.desc: An upgraded but inaccurate brave weapon that can be used from a distance.

item.name: Master Axe
item.desc: An upgraded but inaccurate brave weapon that can be used from a distance.

item.name: Master Bow
item.desc: An upgraded but inaccurate brave weapon with a lot of power behind it.

item.name: Great Bow
item.desc: A colossally-sized bow that can be fired over far distances.

item.name: Magebane Bow
item.desc: Grants wielder RES +10. Silences on hit.

item.name: Glimmer Ward
item.desc: Lowers enemy accuracy slightly on hit.

item.name: Fortune
item.desc: Ally gains +50 accuracy until next turn.

item.name: Mend
item.desc: Restores (User's Magic + 10) HP to self and all adjacent allies.

item.name: Refresh
item.desc: Allows a unit to move again.

item.name: Sandblast
item.desc: Affects medium sized area. Blinds foes.

item.name: Blizzard
item.desc: Damages huge area. Inflicts SPD debuff.

item.name: Fly
item.custom_ai: not 'Rex_Aegis' in [s.id for s in target.status_effects]

item.name: Flux Ward
item.desc: Lowers enemy avoid slightly on hit.

item.name: Nyx Ward
item.desc: Recover HP equal to half damage dealt.

item.name: Ruin Ward
item.desc: Does half damage even on miss.

item.name: Fenrir Ward
item.desc: The strongest conventional form of battle magic.

item.name: TBD LOL
item.desc: Allows a unit to move again.

item.name: Wyvern Tear
item.desc: A draught that boosts the user's DEF and RES.

item.name: Darkness Blast
item.desc:
A draught that makes the user's next attack strike twice. Disables double attacking.

item.name: Angelic Robe
item.desc: Permanently increases its user's maximum HP by 5.

item.name: Power Ring
item.desc: Permanently increases its user's strength and magic by 2.

item.name: Secret Book
item.desc: Permanently increases its user's skill by 3.

item.name: Speedwings
item.desc: Permanently increases its user's speed by 2.

item.name: Mithril Mail
item.desc: Permanently increases its user's defense by 2.

item.name: Talisman
item.desc: Permanently increases its user's resistance by 2.

item.name: Prim's Charm
item.desc: Grants Damage +2 and Damage Taken -2 against enemies with more HP.

item.name: Ghost
item.desc: Rainlash (and not me) done broked something.
